title: global-nav.css
content: /*Adding CSS for global navigation*/ @media screen and (min-width: 1000px) { a.btn.btn__menu.btn--nav-style { display: none; } .right-arrow { display: none; } .nav-items__level-1 { width: 100%; max-width: 860px; } .nav-menu { background: none; min-height: 60px; overflow-x: visible; } .nav-items__level-1 > li { display: inline-block; } .nav-items__level-1 { width: 100%; left: 1px; background: none;height: 100%; } html[dir="rtl"] .nav-items__level-1 { right: 1px; } #main-navigation { display: block !important; background: none; position: absolute; top: 60px; } #main-navigation a { font-size: 1.55rem; padding-right: 1.5rem; padding-left: 1.5rem; z-index: 1050; } .primary-nav-item { height: 100%; display: table !important; vertical-align: middle; max-width: 29%; } .medtronic-com-gr-el .primary-nav-item, .medtronic-com-bg-bg .primary-nav-item{ max-width: 27%; } #main-navigation .primary-nav-item > a.active { background-color: #f2f2f2; color: #002554; text-decoration: none; padding-bottom: 2rem; } #main-navigation .primary-nav-item > a path { fill: #fff; } #main-navigation .primary-nav-item > a.active path { fill: #002554; } #main-navigation > .row { border: 0; } #main-navigation .primary-nav-item > a { color: #fff; } ul.unstyled.nav-items.nav-items__level-1--list { height: 100%; max-height: 60px; display: flex; } ul.unstyled.nav-items.nav-items__level-1--list > li { float: left; } html[dir="rtl"] ul.unstyled.nav-items.nav-items__level-1--list > li { float: right; } a.nav-items__level-1--link { display: table-cell !important; vertical-align: middle; height: 100%; } ul.nav-items { z-index: 1043; padding-top: 0; padding-bottom: 0; } .nav-menu { background: none; top: -60px; min-height: 60px; } .nav-items__level-1--list { padding-top: 0.64rem; padding-bottom: 0; } .nav-items__wrapper.nav-items__level-2.showing { left: 0; top: 60px; width: 100%; background: none; } html[dir="rtl"] .nav-items__wrapper.nav-items__level-2.showing { right: 0; } .nav-items__level-3 { left: 300px; width: 300px; border-left: 1px solid #002554; } html[dir="rtl"] .nav-items__level-3{ left:auto; right:300px; border-right: 1px solid #002554; } .nav-items__level-2, .nav-items__level-3 { background-color: transparent; } .nav-items__level-2.showing .nav-items__level-2--list, .nav-items__level-3.showing .nav-items__level-3--list { display: block; background: #f2f2f2; width: 300px; height: 100%; } .nav-bar .btn--nav-style { z-index: 1050; } .breadcrumbs { z-index: 1050; position: relative; } .nav-items__level-1:after, .nav-items__level-2:after { background-color: transparent; } .nav-items__level-1 li, .nav-items__level-1 a, .nav-items__level-2 li, .nav-items__level-2 a, .nav-items__level-3 li, .nav-items__level-3 a { position: relative; } li.secondary-nav-item.nav-list-item { position: static; } }
